A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good soundtrack and effects\, some of the acting was great\, some was exceptionally bad. Plot was so full of holes it was laughable by the end. Pacing was terrible\, there was a small irrelevant bad movie cut into an okay (ignoring gaping holes in a plot that makes no sense) movie. Also any question you wanted answered by this movie either wasn't addressed at all\, or was answered with \"it doesn't matter\". All the build up of questions and characters just to brush them off. Might be the most flawed plot of an \"A\" list movie ever\, definitely of the thousands I've ever seen.
